subject: Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: In a companion piece to Teton Gravity Research’s “Higher Unplugged” series, the snowboarder Jeremy Jones traveled to the French Alps to join big mountain rider Xavier de Le Rue.
snippet: In a companion piece to Teton Gravity Research’s “Higher Unplugged” series, the snowboarder Jeremy Jones traveled to the French Alps to join big mountain rider Xavier de Le Rue.
